name: Space Shooter (itch) (ShoutingRex893)
description:
Hello, this is my first game, I know it is very incomplete but I was very excited to see what people thought about my game and that, If you want to give me a recommendation I will be reading it without any problem, thank you very much!

How to play:

Simple, With left and right arrow you can move up and down and with space you shoot

Everytime you destroy a meteor you will win a point but if you get hit by the meteor you will lose 5 points

if you get less than 0 points the game will close
